thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Shelly

author: Shelly
title: Shelly
text:
I like booking through Flighthub because it compares fares over multiple airlines, and it looks at each leg of the flight independently (e.g. you can fly one way with one airline, then fly the return trip with another airline). This way, I tend to get the best deal possible. When I compare the flight price with the actual airline's website, Flighthub always seems to come out cheaper.
The one hiccup I had once was when Flighthub had to cancel my ticket within 4 hours from booking it because the airline had not issued a ticket for my flight to Flighthub. Fortunately I was able to quickly rebook at the airline's website shortly thereafter.
